verses.verse: Woe <S%H1945><s%> to them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for <S%H5833>help<s%>, and <S%H8172>rely<s%> on <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H7393>chariots<s%> because they are <S%H7227>many<s%>, and in <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> because they are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6105>strong<s%>, but they <S%H8159>look<s%> not unto the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>!

Yet he also is <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and will not call <S%H5493>back<s%> his <S%H1697>words<s%>, but will <S%H6965>arise<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7489>evil-doers<s%>, and against the <S%H5833>help<s%> of them that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.

Now the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> are <S%H120>men<s%>, and not <S%H410>God<s%>; and their <S%H5483>horses<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, and not <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: and when <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> shall stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, both he that <S%H5826>helpeth<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%>, and he that is <S%H5826>helped<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%>, and they all shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> unto <S%H738>me<s%>, As the lion and the young <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H1897>growling<s%> over his <S%H2964>prey<s%>, if a <S%H4393>multitude<s%> of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> be called <S%H7121>forth<s%> against <S%H2865>him<s%>, will not be dismayed at their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, nor <S%H6031>abase<s%> himself for the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of <S%H3068>them<s%>: so will Jehovah of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> come <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H6633>fight<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and upon the hill <S%H1389>thereof<s%>.

As <S%H6833>birds<s%> <S%H5774>hovering<s%>, so will <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> <S%H1598>protect<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; he will <S%H1598>protect<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H6452>it<s%>, he will pass over and preserve <S%H4422>it<s%>.
Turn <S%H7725><s%> ye unto him from whom ye have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H5627>revolted<s%>, O <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

For in that <S%H3117>day<s%> they shall cast <S%H3988>away<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and his <S%H457>idols<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, which your own <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> unto you for a <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

And the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, not of <S%H376>man<s%>; and the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, not of <S%H120>men<s%>, shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H5127>him<s%>; and he shall flee <S%H6440>from<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and his young <S%H970>men<s%> shall become subject to <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>.

And his <S%H5553>rock<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>away<s%> by reason of <S%H4032>terror<s%>, and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H5251>ensign<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, whose <S%H217>fire<s%> is in <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and his <S%H8574>furnace<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
